# LibraryArtistFilter

**Protocol**

Artist properties your app uses as a filter for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol LibraryArtistFilter
```

## Instance Properties

- **genres**: The artist’s associated genres.
- **id**: The unique identifier for the artist.
- **name**: The name of the artist.
- **playlists**: The artist’s associated playlists.

items.description: The unique identifier for the artist.
items.name: id

title: LibraryArtistFilter
